We are from the Netherlands created to help Ukrainians to find a job.
More than 2 years of cooperation with different companies in the Nederlands
We’ve already helped to 300+ Ukrainians for the last two years.

We’ll help find your business perfect worker

Our company will find right person for your business. We’ve been working with different kinds of companies and ready for any new cooperation.

Below you can see all the vacancies and information that we provide for our people.

Cleaning
What are you going to do?
MORE INFO
    Responsibilities:
  • Ensure all surfaces are free of dust and dirt.
  • Maintain clean and hygienic flooring.
  • Keep carpets clean and free of debris.
  • Collect and dispose of waste materials.
  • Sanitize toilets, sinks, and other restroom fixtures.
  • Replenish cleaning and restroom supplies.

Warehouse
What are you going to do?
MORE INFO
    The work of an order picker in logistics consists of:
  • Picking and packing orders;
  • Store incoming goods in the warehouse;
  • Check outgoing goods (prepare for shipment);
  • Repackaging of items.
    • LESS INFO
Hospitality
What are you going to do?
MORE INFO
    Hospitality worker Tasks:
  • Customer Service: Greet, seat, take orders, and ensure satisfaction.
  • Food & Beverage Service: Serve accurately and promptly, monitor and replenish.
  • Cleanliness: Maintain clean areas, set and clear tables, follow hygiene standards.
  • Payment: Handle bills, transactions, and provide receipts.
  • Event Support: Assist with setup, breakdown, transport, and inventory.
    • LESS INFO

MORE INFO

  • Official employment under a contract
  • You will work in a good team with awesome atmosphere
  • We offer social benefits and medical insurance
  • We can help with a living space
  • We provide all necessary equipment

Market
What are you going to do?
MORE INFO
    Market Worker Assignments:
  • Customer Service: Assist customers and handle inquiries.
  • Sales Transactions: Process sales and handle cash and card transactions.
  • Stock Management: Restock shelves and maintain product displays.
  • Cleanliness: Keep the market area clean and organized.
  • Inventory Control: Track inventory levels and report shortages
    • LESS INFO
Greenhouse
What are you going to do?
MORE INFO
    Garden Duties:
  • Plant and Grounds Care: Water, prune, fertilize plants, mow lawns, and maintain flower beds.
  • Maintenance: Keep greenhouse and park areas clean and organized, including facilities like benches and restrooms.
  • Pest and Safety Control: Monitor and manage pests, diseases, and safety hazards.
    • LESS INFO
